Grouped_Utterances: I’ve been applying to more jobs, but I still feel anxious about it.   I tried a few breathing exercises, and they helped a little.   No interviews yet, but I’m hoping to get some soon.   Yes, one of my contacts mentioned a potential opening and said they’d refer me.

I feel a bit of tension.   I feel more relaxed now.   *Opens eyes* Wow, that was nice.   I feel calmer. I think I could use this before interviews.   It feels good to know that people are looking out for me.

That’s a positive step! Breathing exercises can be very grounding. Would you like to practice another technique together today?   Great! Let’s try a simple body scan exercise. Find a comfortable position and close your eyes if you’re comfortable.   Now, take a deep breath in… hold it for a moment… and exhale slowly.   Good. Now, bring your awareness to your toes. Notice any sensations there…   Now, slowly move your awareness up to your feet, your legs, and continue to breathe deeply.   I’ve been trying to focus on my strengths again, like we discussed.   Maybe some positive affirmations?   That’s a wonderful idea! Let’s brainstorm a few together. How about, “I am capable and deserving of success”?   “I learn and grow from every experience.”   That’s a powerful affirmation! It emphasizes resilience. Would you like to create a list of affirmations to keep handy?
